description: '''Gospel trap''' also known as '''trap gospel''' is a sub-genre of [[Christian hip hop]] that emerged in the [[southern United States]] during the late 2010s. It is characterized by the use of [[Trap music|trap]] beats and lyrics about Christianity and Jesus. Gospel trap often include violent metaphors for God's love or allusions to being saved from a life of vanity, crime, and drug use by God. Artists like Alex Jean, Caleb Gordon, BigBreeze, Mike Teezy, and [[Wande (rapper)|Wande]] are considered leading figures of the sub-genre.
